challengeFiles.name: styles

tests.text: Your p selector should have a display property set to flex.
Your p selector should have a justify-content property set to space-between.

description: Now we can add the horizontal spacing using flex. In your p selector, add a display property set to flex and a justify-content property set to space-between.
